1081x
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
1x
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
const selectors = {
	navigation: '.js-o-navigation-main__nav',
	submenu: '.js-o-navigation-main__item--has-children',
	burger: '.js-o-navigation-main__burger',
	pageTemplate: '.js-page-template',
	close: '.js-o-navigation-main__close',
	itemHasChildren: '.js-o-navigation-main__item--has-children',
	submenuLink: '.js-o-navigation-main__link',
	list: '.js-o-navigation-main__list',
	link: '.js-o-navigation-main__link',
	arrowIcon: '.js-o-navigation-main__icon',
	burgerIcon: '.js-o-navigation-main__burger-icon',
};
 
const modifiers = {
	selectedSubmenu: 'o-navigation-main__sub--selected',
	hiddenSudmenu: 'o-navigation-main__sub--is-hidden',
	openedNav: 'o-navigation-main__nav--is-open',
	openedNavtemplate: 'nav-main--is-open',
	unscrollableBody: 'body--is-unscrollable',
	burgerIconActive: 'o-navigation-main__burger-icon--active',
	arrowIconActive: 'o-navigation-main__icon--active',
};
 
class NavigationMain {
	constructor($el) {
		this.selectedSubmenu = modifiers.selectedSubmenu;
		this.hiddenSudmenu = modifiers.hiddenSudmenu;
		this.openedNav = modifiers.openedNav;
		this.openedNavtemplate = modifiers.openedNavtemplate;
		this.unscrollableBody = modifiers.unscrollableBody;
		this.burgerIconActive = modifiers.burgerIconActive;
		this.arrowIconActive = modifiers.arrowIconActive;
 
		this.submenuLink = selectors.submenuLink;
		this.list = selectors.list;
		this.link = selectors.link;
		this.arrowIcon = selectors.arrowIcon;
		this.burgerIcon = selectors.burgerIcon;
 
		this.$el = $el;
		this.$page = $(document.body);
		this.$pageTemplate = $(document.querySelector(selectors.pageTemplate));
 
		this.$itemHasChildren = selectors.itemHasChildren;
		this.$navigation = selectors.navigation;
 
		this.$burger = this.$el.find(selectors.burger);
		this.$burger.on('click', this.openNav.bind(this));
 
		this.$submenu = this.$el.find(selectors.submenu);
		this.$submenu.children(this.submenuLink).on('click', this.openSubMenu.bind(this));
 
		this.$close = this.$el.find(selectors.close);
		this.$close.on('click', this.closeSubMenu.bind(this));
	}
 
	openSubMenu(event) {
		event.preventDefault();
		const selected = $(event.currentTarget);
		if (selected.next(this.list)
			.hasClass(this.hiddenSudmenu)) {
			selected.addClass(this.selectedSubmenu)
				.next(this.list)
				.removeClass(this.hiddenSudmenu)
				.end()
				.find(this.arrowIcon)
				.addClass(this.arrowIconActive);
			selected.parent(this.$itemHasChildren)
				.siblings(this.$itemHasChildren)
				.find(this.arrowIcon)
				.removeClass(this.arrowIconActive);
			selected.parent(this.$itemHasChildren)
				.siblings(this.$itemHasChildren)
				.children(this.list)
				.addClass(this.hiddenSudmenu)
				.end()
				.children(this.link)
				.removeClass(this.selectedSubmenu);
		} else {
			selected.removeClass(this.selectedSubmenu).next(this.list).addClass(this.hiddenSudmenu);
			selected.find(this.arrowIcon)
				.removeClass(this.arrowIconActive);
		}
	}
 
	closeSubMenu(event) {
		event.preventDefault();
		const selected = $(event.currentTarget);
		selected.parent(this.list).addClass(this.hiddenSudmenu);
		selected.parent(this.list).parent(this.$itemHasChildren)
			.find(this.arrowIcon)
			.removeClass(this.arrowIconActive);
	}
 
	openNav(event) {
		event.preventDefault();
		const icon = $(event.currentTarget).find(this.burgerIcon);
		const navigation = $(event.currentTarget).next(this.$navigation);
		icon.toggleClass(this.burgerIconActive);
		navigation.toggleClass(this.openedNav);
		this.$pageTemplate.toggleClass(this.openedNavtemplate);
		this.$page.toggleClass(this.unscrollableBody);
	}
}
 
export default NavigationMain;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Aug 28 2017 16:13:34 GMT+0200 (CEST)
